column1: Little Goat Diner////While I could probably live off of these bloody mary's alone
column2: I thought it would probably be best to chase the vodka with some food
column4: since that's what we originally came for. This menu is certainly not for the faint of heart
column5: or for that matter - those prone to heart attacks. The menu is ambitious
column7: but not necessarily nutritious. Fat Elvis waffles
column8: breakfast spaghetti and bull's eye french toast (with crispy chicken) are just a few of the heavy hitters you'll find on the menu - so bring your appetite when you come to eat here. Sure
column9: there are a few lighter and possibly healthier menu options... but let's be honest
column10: that's not why you came here (it was for the bloody Mary).
